definitions.text: fail to agree with; be in violation of; as of rules or patterns
examples: This sentence violates the rules of syntax

definitions.text: act in disregard of laws, rules, contracts, or promises
examples: violate the basic laws or human civilization

definitions.text: violate the sacred character of a place or language
examples: violate the sanctity of the church

definitions.text: force (someone) to have sex against their will
examples: The woman was raped on her way home at night

definitions.text: destroy and strip of its possession
examples: The soldiers raped the beautiful country
